doc.repnme: Agua y saneamiento para las zonas marginales urbanas de America Latina
doc.abstracts: This report summarizes the proceedings of a workshop on water and sanitation for the marginalized urban areas of Latina America. There were four objectives to the workshop: (1) promote a dialogue among themselves; (2) share the results of a study on seven Latin American cities, thus promoting an exchange of information between cities; (3) define urgent action items for each city and the need for support; and (4) propose a basis for collaboration between the cities. The study has revealed how the cities are dealing with the problem of providing water, sanitation and hygiene to the marginal urban areas of each city. The conclusions focus on the institutional, financial, social, and technical aspects of providing water and sanitation services to periurban areas.
